Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by California in 1970...
Injured on 8/19/1971 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/27/1972 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 6/19/1973 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 7/10/1973 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5-6 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/13/1975...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1979, winning 2 games with a 0.59 ERA...
Injured on 4/22/1980 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1980, going 4-0, 1.48...
Injured on 6/5/1980 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1980, winning 2 games with a 0.56 ERA...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/18/1983 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 9/4/1984 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/4/1985 to a 2-year deal worth $8,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1985, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1986...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/3/1987 to a 1-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
